Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc03

Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.networking.socket.messages.serverToClientMessages

package it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.networking.socket.messages.serverToClientMessages
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.networking.socket.messages
     
    it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.networking.socket.messages.clientToServerMessages
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    SocketServerGenericMessage
    Abstract class representing a generic message that is sent from the server to the client.
    SocketServerMessageAddedPoint
    This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that the points have been added.
    SocketServerMessageAddedPointObjective
    This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that the points obtained with the Objective cards have been calculated.
    SocketServerMessageCanNotPlaceCard
    This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that a card cannot be placed.
    SocketServerMessageCardAddedToHand
    This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that a card has been successfully added to his hand.
    SocketServerMessageCardNotAddedToHand
    This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that a card was not added to his hand.
    SocketServerMessageDeckHasNoCards
    This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that a deck has no cards.
    SocketServerMessageDrawCard
    This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that a player has to draw a card.
    SocketServerMessageEndGameConditionsReached
    This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that the conditions to end the game have been reached.
    SocketServerMessageGameCreated
    This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that a game has been created.
    SocketServerMessageGameEnded
    This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that the game has ended.
    SocketServerMessageGameIdNotExists
    This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that the game id doesn't exist.
    SocketServerMessageGameSizeUpdated
    This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that the points obtained with the Objective cards have been calculated.
    SocketServerMessageGameStarted
    This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that the game has started.
    SocketServerMessageIndexNotValid
    This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that the index is invalid.
    SocketServerMessageInvalidCoordinates
    This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that the coordinates where he wants to insert the card are not valid.
    SocketServerMessageJoinUnableGameFull
    This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that a player tried to join a full game.
    SocketServerMessageJoinUnableNicknameAlreadyInUse
    This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that a player tried to use a nickname that is already in use.
    SocketServerMessageLastCircle
    This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that the last circle has started.
    SocketServerMessageNextTurn
    This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that the next turn triggered.
    SocketServerMessageNoGameToReconnect
    This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that there is no game to reconnect.
    SocketServerMessageObjectiveCardChosen
    This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that the Objective card was chosen correctly.
    SocketServerMessageObjectiveCardNotChosen
    This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that the Objective card was not chosen correctly.
    SocketServerMessageOnlyOnePlayerConnected
    This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that only one player is connected.
    SocketServerMessagePlayerDisconnected
    This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that a player has disconnected.
    SocketServerMessagePlayerJoined
    This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that a player has joined the game.
    SocketServerMessagePlayerLeft
    This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that a player has left the game.
    SocketServerMessagePlayerReconnected
    This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that a player has reconnected to the game.
    SocketServerMessagePositionedCardIntoCodex
    This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that the card was placed into the Codex.
    SocketServerMessagePositionedStarterCardIntoCodex
    This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that the Starter card was placed into the Codex.
    SocketServerMessageRequirementsPlacementNotRespected
    This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that the positioning requirements are not respected.
    SocketServerMessageSentChatMessage
    This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that a message has been sent.
    SocketServerMessageWinnerDeclared
    This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform which players won the game.
